BEA MOLAR

Education

Visayas State University, Baybay City Leyte, Main Campus

(DSCT) Department of Computer Science and Technology

I am currently pursuing a Bachelor of Science in Computer Science at Visayas State University, Main Campus, Baybay City, Leyte, since 2022. My passion for technology is fueled by my love for sci-fi genres and a fascination with outer space. These interests inspire my educational journey in computer science, where I am captivated by the innovative advancements in the field. I enjoy the challenges of problem-solving and the creativity that programming requires, and I am excited to explore the endless possibilities technology offers.

My primary areas of interest within computer science include Natural Language Processing (NLP), Machine Learning, and Back-End Web Development/Software Development. I am drawn to these fields because they blend theoretical knowledge with practical application, allowing me to engage in projects that can make a real impact. I find NLP particularly fascinating for its potential to enhance communication between humans and machines, while machine learning intrigues me with its ability to uncover insights from data. As I continue to explore these areas, I look forward to gaining hands-on experience and developing my skills to prepare for the challenges of the industry.

Work Experience

(MPDO) Municpal Planning and Development Office

Part-time Associate | June 18 - July 18, 2024

As a part-time associate at MPDO, I gained valuable experience working with essential office tools for document processing, data organization, and reporting, which helped streamline day-to-day operations. I assisted in managing server systems and databases to support data handling for 51 barangays, ensuring the smooth processing and retrieval of information. Additionally, I utilized user-friendly mapping software to assist in basic planning tasks and development projects, contributing to the overall success of the office's initiatives.
